name: Youth Mental Health & Screens
search:
("youth mental health" OR "teen depression" OR "suicide risk" OR "child well-being") 
AND ("screen time" OR "social media" OR "digital media" OR "technology use")

name: Smartphones in Schools
search:
("ban smartphones in schools" OR "cellphone free schools" OR "phone-free classroom" 
OR "classroom smartphone policies" OR "students screen time education")

name: Tech Accountability & Safeguards
search: ("child online safety" OR "child online safety bill" OR "tech product safety"  OR "technology safeguards children" OR "digital wellness legislation") AND (Congress OR legislation OR law OR regulation)

name: Parent & Community Organizing
search:
("parent advocacy" OR "parents organizing" OR "community response" OR "local chapters") 
AND ("screen time" OR "media addiction" OR "digital media")

name: Media & Policy Landscape
search:
("media addiction" OR "digital wellness" OR "runaway tech" OR "screen addiction") 
AND ("public health" OR "policy" OR "legislation" OR "expert insights")

name: Industry Narrative / Counter-Messaging
search:
("tech industry defense" OR "Silicon Valley" OR "social media companies") 
AND ("youth mental health" OR "child safety" OR "screen time")

name: MAMA in the News
search:
("Mothers Against Media Addiction") 
OR ("Julie Scelfo" AND ("media ecologist" OR "youth mental health"))
